room_title: Escape room "The Bunker" by Escape Experience Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: The bunker is so immersive. I loved every second of it.

room_title: Escape room "The Bunker" by Escape Experience Chattanooga in Chattanooga
review: I did the bunker with one other person. We did not make it out because there are just too many puzzles for two people. This was a really great experience. The bunker feels real and they did a really great job with this room. I would recommend a minimum of 4 players for this room. It is big enough to fit 8 easily.
